                 [book]地图简介 [book]

After its first map Ratchet & Clank, the TCorp now gives you a PvP one, a capture the points, in which the goal is to destroy or defend severals beacons, depending on which team you belong. 

The infected : they can choose several classes before joining the battlefield, and their time as well as their respawns are limited. 

The defenders : they have to sustain approximatively an hour with at least one intact beacon or to make the infected run out of tickets. 

The battlefield is divided in 3 differents areas, in which there are several beacons to blow up before switching to the next area. 
Stuff and bonus are hidden throughout the map. There is also a killstreak system for each team. For more details about them, click here.

The map is available for download now (recommended version: 1.8.7) 




                                   [board]文章翻译 [board]


在它们的第一张地图【瑞奇与叮当】之后，TCorp团队创作了一个PVP地图，占领据点，其目的就是要摧毁或守护其中主要的几个标点，取决于你是属于哪一个队伍。

感染者目标：加入战场之前他们可以选择几个不同的地点，然而他们的重生机会是有限的。

守护者目标：他们需要至少在一个小时以内守护并保持一个完整的标点不被破坏，或者是让感染者失去所有的“门票？”

战场分为3个不同的区域，在其中当切换到下一个区域的时候会有数个标点被破坏。物品和奖金是隐藏在整个地图里的。每个队伍都会有一个“killstreak system”。想了解更多，请点击这里。


地图以允许下载（推荐版本：1.8.7）
